EmailTemplate.subject: NCS Associate Mentors 2016 - Choose your waves!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CONGRATULATIONS ON SUCCESSFULLY BECOMING AN NCS ASSOCIATE MENTOR THIS SUMMER! TIME TO CHOSE YOUR WAVES... Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Well done for successfully making it through the application, assessment and training to become an NCS Associate Mentor this summer!
You can now chose the waves you want to volunteer on!
CLICK HERE TO CHOOSE YOU WAVES - https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vOnZvpONl3TeSCV24C8jL3kBIkaKLqXUAL69TRQ7SlQ/edit?usp=sharing
Click on the link above, read the instructions and choose the borough and dates that work best for you.
The deadline to chose your waves is 11PM ON SUNDAY 12TH JUNE.
Once you have chosen them, we will be in touch to confirm, and provide you will the exact time and venue information you need.
If you have any queries about this process, please contact samuel.hepher@the-challenge.org.
We look forward to seeing you in the summer! All the best
NCS Graduates Team The Challenge
